value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Summer is upon us once again...
I hope that everyone has spent
the last year preparing for this!$k$pHeroes running free, clad only in
swimsuits... What a spectacular
season!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Commander Anna... Please tell me
that we're not going to be chasing
Heroes across a beach again...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Alfonse... It won't be anything
like last year...because I have an
all-new tome!$k$pIt records sound, not pictures... So
we'll fill it up with the shouts and
squeals of Heroes at play!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|You're going to end up owing the
Anna from the other realm an
incredible sum of money, aren't you?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|You'd think that! But she didn't want
quite so much for audio. I negotiated
a few zeroes off her initial offer...$k$pAnd now that we've come to an
agreement, there's no turning back!$k$pGather your belongings. We're
headed to the beach!$k$pFor the future of the Order of
Heroes...or its finances, at any rate.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Swim18,Face|I came here to settle things with
Ephraim...only to get caught up in
this mess.$k$pBound by this contract, we have no
choice—we must fight.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Swim18,Face|Innes, wait! I'll help you!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Swim18,Face|Tana! That attire...$k$pDo you really consider it appropriate
for a princess of Frelia to be seen in
public in such silly attire?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Swim18,Face|You're one to talk! Is that a battle
standard or a towel?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Swim18,Face|Innes...I must apologize. We lost.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Swim18,Face|Spare me your apologies, unless
they're about your garb! Let us retreat
for now.$k$p$Sbs150|
